title: Keep Your Joy
itunes:title: Keep Your Joy
description:
We all have opportunities to get upset and go around frustrated each day. But in the big picture, most of the things that are upsetting us don’t really matter. Don’t let the small things keep you from seeing the gift of each day. Live from a place of peace and joy and watch your life change for the better.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
